attributes.action: Review the appointment of all new police commissioners based on turn out at the election.
attributes.additional_details: Now that the voting is over , and more than 80% of the British public were either, not interested, or hadn't sufficient information to make an educated vote. Should not the government postpone the appointments of the Police commissioners until a suitably significicant percentage of the populaton deems it necessary to vote for them, or treat us like a democracy and realise we really are not interested!
